params.base: The address of the base currency
params.token: The address of the share token

params.brokerbot: The brokerbot address that is synced

params._base: The contract of the base currency of the brokerbot.
params._brokerbot: The brokerbot contract that should be registered.
params._token: The contract of the share token of the brokerbot.

params._brokerbot: The brokerbot that should be synced

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getBrokerbot(address,address).notice: Returns the brokerbot address for a given pair base and share token, or address 0 if it does not exist

registerBrokerbot(address,address,addres.notice: Per network only one active brokerbot should exist per base/share pair

syncBrokerbot(address).notice: This event is usful for indexers/subgraphs to update token balances which are not tracked with other events

userdoc.notice: Holds a registry from all deployed active brokerbots

t_mapping(t_contract(IERC20)1981,t_mappi.label: mapping(contract IERC20 => mapping(contract IERC20 => contract IBrokerbot))
